item.title: Fairese Prepares to Release a Major Update to Its Beloved Anime-Tracking App Silvianna After Years in Development
item.description: Silvianna 26 launches October 28 â€” introducing a refreshed Liquid Glass design, remade widgets, smarter search, and a redesigned app icon inspired by its original mascot.
